title: Cropify ‚Äì Image Crop & Resize
description:
üì∏ Cropify ‚Äì Image Crop & Resize

Cropify is a powerful yet simple image cropper app designed to help you crop, resize, rotate, and flip photos with precision. Built for speed and ease of use, Cropify works completely offline and gives you full control over how your images look.

Whether you‚Äôre editing photos for social media, creating thumbnails, resizing images for profiles, or simply trimming unwanted parts, Cropify is the perfect photo cropping tool for everyday use.

‚úÇÔ∏è Advanced Image Cropping

Crop images freely or use preset aspect ratios to get perfect dimensions every time. Choose from popular ratios like 1:1, 4:5, 9:16, 16:9, 4:3, 3:2, and more. You can also use custom aspect ratios for full flexibility.

Adjust the crop area using intuitive drag handles while smoothly zooming and panning the image for accurate results.


üîÑ Rotate & Flip Images Easily

Rotate photos in 90-degree steps or flip images horizontally and vertically with a single tap. All transformations are non-destructive, so your image quality stays intact.

Smooth animations and haptic feedback make editing feel fast and responsive.


üîç Precise Zoom & Pan Controls

Pinch to zoom and pan your image effortlessly while cropping. Cropify ensures stable and accurate controls, allowing you to focus on the exact area you want to keep.


üñºÔ∏è Full-Screen Image Preview

Preview your cropped image in full screen before saving or sharing. Zoom in to inspect details and confirm the final output with confidence.


üìÇ History & Bulk Image Management

All your cropped images are automatically saved and organized in one place. Use the history screen to:
- View recent crops
- Select multiple images
- Share or export images in bulk
- Delete unwanted images easily


üîó Seamless Android Share Integration

Cropify integrates deeply with Android. Open images directly from other apps using Share ‚Üí Cropify and start editing instantly‚Äîno extra steps required.


‚ö° Fast, Offline & Lightweight

Cropify works 100% offline, keeping your photos private and your workflow uninterrupted. No internet connection is needed, and no unnecessary data is collected.

The app is lightweight, fast, and optimized for smooth performance even on low-end devices.


‚úÖ Why Choose Cropify?

‚úî Easy-to-use photo cropper
‚úî Free-style and fixed aspect ratio cropping
‚úî Rotate and flip images instantly
‚úî High-quality image export
‚úî Full-screen preview before saving
‚úî History with multi-select and bulk export
‚úî Works completely offline
‚úî Clean and modern UI

Cropify is the ideal image cropping and resizing app for anyone looking for a fast, reliable, and easy photo editing experience. Download Cropify and take full control of your images today.
